channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: Laughing Death
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (Charles Conger Stewart)
item.description: She warned him about the fat man, but Jim wouldn't listen. He was determined to know who the fat man was, and why Hester refused to tell him more!
